sentences.sContent: Bees sip honey from flowers and hum their thanks when they leave.
sentences.sContent_eng: Bees sip honey from flowers and hum their thanks when they leave.
sentences.sCn: 蜜蜂从花中啜蜜，离开时营营地道谢。 獥，% 韐罔。

sentences.sContent: We afford you the opportunity to dine with delight, to sip in style, to relax in Comfort.
sentences.sContent_eng: We afford you the opportunity to dine with delight, to sip in style, to relax in Comfort.
sentences.sCn: 我们将竭诚为您提供愉快进餐的良机，优雅的啜饮，舒适的休憩。

synos.tran: 抿；小口喝；单列直插式组件

trans.tranCn: 小口喝， 抿； 一小口的量
trans.tranOther: a very small amount of a drink
